column4: does anyone have a great tip for my gnome-problem? i dont know what i did wrong. it doesnt show anything properly anymore since i did dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and thats bad ;(
what do you mean it doesn't "show anything properly"
the windows becone black and half of the background image is missing o_O
does sound like it might be a videocard issue, but i'm hardly an expert
